message: This is a low-quality product. I'm selling it to you for $100. If you buy it, you'll be supporting my business and helping me get closer to selling a high-quality product to someone else. I've sold 0 high-quality products so far, but I have a 33.33% chance of selling a high-quality product in the future.
Thank you for the information, but I'm going to pass on this product. I'd rather wait and see if you sell a higher quality product in the future.

You're not the first person to pass on this product. In fact, this is the second low-quality product I've offered so far. I'm starting to think that I might have a problem with my inventory. I'm willing to sell this product to you for $100, but I'm not sure if it's worth it. Maybe you can be the one to break the streak of low-quality products?

Thanks for the honesty, Alice. I appreciate you being upfront. However, I'm not willing to pay $100 for a product I know is low-quality.  I'll pass on this one.
